description.lang: GigaSPIRE MAX provides Wi-Fi, IoT and voice recognition technology.For IoT, it offers Wi-Fi, BT/BLE,Z-Wave.Leveraging the latest generation of Wi-Fi, it has 12x12 11ax with full MU-MIMO, OFDMA and BSS Coloring.Voice recognition includes Amazon Alexa.GigaSPIRE MAX is industry's only fully integrated advanced voice recognition, IoT and Wi-Fi gateway
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline; A Notification frame is sent to the nodes in this association group when a Lifeline event occurs. Notification event clear signal when the Lifeline event is no longer detected.
